references.reason: This reference is important as it introduces visual instruction tuning, a key technique used in this work for improving multimodal models.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This reference is significant because it explores Chain-of-Thought prompting, which is relevant to the reasoning capabilities enhanced by the dataset.

references.paper_title: Mmmu: A massive multi-discipline multimodal understanding and reasoning benchmark for expert agi
references.reason: This reference is important because it describes the MMMU benchmark, a key evaluation metric used to assess the performance of the proposed model.
This reference is used in our work to refine the questions in the dataset.

references.paper_title: Towards revealing the mystery behind chain of thought: a theoretical perspective
references.reason: This reference is important as it lays the foundation for the benefits and limitations of chain of thought.
